height.label: Height
height.purpose: Choosing garment lengths, size charts and tights.
how: Stand barefoot with your heels, seat and shoulder blades against a wall.
Keep your head level (Frankfurt plane).
Place a book on the crown, mark the point on the wall and measure down to the floor.

chest.label: Chest circumference
how: Stand relaxed and exhale.
Wrap the tape around the fullest part of the chest, under the arms, level to the floor.
Join the ends without squeezing and read the value.

waist.label: Waist circumference
how: Find the narrowest part of your torso (usually above the navel).
Wrap the tape horizontally, snug but not tight, without sucking in your stomach.
Read while breathing naturally.

waist_pants.label: Waist (for trousers)
waist_pants.purpose: Jeans, chinos, suit trousers ‚Äì measured exactly where you wear them.
how: Stand relaxed and locate the level where you normally wear trousers.
Wrap the tape horizontally around that line, keeping it level at the back.
Do not suck in your stomach; leave the amount of ease you find comfortable.

hips.label: Hip circumference
how: Stand with your feet together.
Loop the tape around the fullest part of the seat, level to the floor.
Make sure the tape doesn‚Äôt drop at the back; read the value.

shoulder.label: Shoulder width
how: Stand upright and ask someone to help.
Place the tape on one shoulder tip (acromion).
Run straight across to the opposite shoulder tip and read the value.

sleeve.label: Sleeve length
how: Bend the elbow slightly (~15¬∞).
Measure from the shoulder edge to the wrist along the outside of the arm.
Optional: shoulder ‚Üí top of elbow ‚Üí wrist in two segments.

neck.label: Neck / collar circumference
how: Wrap the tape at the base of the neck where the collar sits.
Insert one finger under the tape (about 1‚Äì2 cm ease).
Read the value.

bust.label: Bust circumference
how: Stand upright and breathe normally.
Wrap the tape around the fullest part of the bust, level to the floor.
Ensure the tape stays level at the back and read without squeezing.

underbust.label: Underbust circumference
underbust.purpose: Bras (band size), sports tops, one-piece suits.
how: Wrap the tape firmly just under the bust, level to the floor.
Exhale and tighten slightly (without discomfort).
Read the value in centimetres.

torso_girth.label: Torso girth
how: Place the start of the tape at the base of the neck (front).
Bring it through the legs to the nape, closing the loop.
Keep the tape close to the body and read the total length.

inseam.label: Inseam length
how: Stand upright and barefoot.
Place the tape at the crotch seam and run it down the inner leg to the ankle.
Read at the point where you want the hem to end.

thigh.label: Thigh circumference
thigh.purpose: Trousers cut and comfort at the thigh.
how: Stand relaxed.
Wrap the tape around the fullest part of the thigh, level to the floor.
Do not squeeze; read the value.

foot_length.label: Foot length
how: Place your heel against a wall with your foot on a sheet of paper.
Mark the tip of the longest toe.
Measure from the wall to the mark in cm (measure both feet and take the larger value).

foot_width.label: Foot width / girth
how: Stand with weight evenly distributed on both feet.
Wrap the tape around the widest part of the forefoot or measure the flat width.
Record the circumference or width in centimetres.

finger.label: Finger circumference
how: Wrap a strip of paper or tape at the base of the finger.
Mark where the ends meet, unroll it and measure the length.
Measure in the evening with warm hands; take the larger of two attempts.

wrist.label: Wrist circumference
how: Wrap the tape above the wrist bone.
Add your preferred ease (0‚Äì2 cm).
Record the result and preferred comfort level.

hand_circumference.label: Hand circumference (without thumb)
how: Relax the hand and keep the fingers together.
Wrap the tape around the knuckles (excluding the thumb).
Gently clench a fist, ensure it isn‚Äôt tight, then read the value.

hand_length.label: Hand length
how: Place the start of the tape on the wrist crease (palm side).
Run it straight to the tip of the middle finger.
Read the value in centimetres.

head.label: Head circumference
how: Position the tape 1‚Äì2 cm above the eyebrows and over the ears.
Wrap it horizontally around the largest part of the head.
Join the ends without pressure and read the value.

hero.title: GiftFit nails the size every single time!
hero.body:
No more stress when choosing a present! You know that feeling when you want to buy someone the perfect sweater, dream shoes or beautiful lingerie, but a single question freezes you: "Which size should I pick?" Asking outright ruins the surprise. Guessing far too often ends with a return.

GiftFit solves this problem once and for all.
hero.cardBody: GiftFit families save an average of 3 hours a month on exchanges and lean on more than 10 million size profiles.

friction.title: Stop guessing.
friction.body: Say goodbye to the anxiety and awkward moments caused by wrong sizes. GiftFit is your personal guarantee of a delightful gift and total peace of mind. Discover how easily you can choose perfectly fitted clothes, shoes and accessories that genuinely delight your loved ones. Show them you know them inside out while keeping the surprise alive until the big reveal. With GiftFit every occasion becomes pure joy, without risky guesses or annoying returns.

catalog.title: Your private size catalog.
catalog.body: Imagine having every single measurement ‚Äì from your best-fit jeans to your running shoe size and even ring circumference ‚Äì organised in one place, always at hand. That confidence makes online shopping effortless. Forget frustration and wasted time on returns; intentional shopping helps you minimise mistakes, save money and stay calm. Most importantly, your data remains top-secret: private, secure and accessible only to you.

gifts.title: Gifts that always fit
gifts.body: Say goodbye to awkward size changes. It is completely natural. With GiftFit you keep full discretion and the guarantee that every present will fit perfectly. Simply update your profile whenever you feel like it‚Äîno explanations, no judgement. Enjoy gifts that feel right from the very first moment. Pure joy and confidence, without any awkward questions.

secret.title: Unlock the magic of Secret Giver.
secret.body: This feature lets you discreetly check one precise size for someone special, so your gift fits perfectly while the surprise stays hidden. You‚Äôre always in control: if privacy matters most, you can disable the option instantly with a single click. It‚Äôs the perfect balance between the joy of gifting and your sense of security.

share.title: Make gifting joyful for your circle!
share.body: Wave goodbye to awkward returns and forced smiles. Share your profile safely with a trusted circle of family and friends. The best part? You stay in full control. Decide exactly who sees what ‚Äì maybe your partner sees shirt and shoe sizes, while your best friend only sees ring size. They gain the confidence to buy gifts you‚Äôll truly love, and you enjoy presents that fit perfectly every single time.

cta.kicker: Ready to nail every gift, every time?
cta.heading: Join GiftFit and leave size stress behind for good.
cta.body: Experience the joy of giving presents that simply fit. Sign up for free and invite your circle ‚Äì together you‚Äôll turn uncertainty into the pure pleasure of gifting.
